name: Marble X
description:
We love marble machines. But sometimes we don´t have conditions to create projects in our home for lack of space.

So, we create a digital project to nurish the criativity of those who want to play but don´t have materials or spaces for this. It´s something like a videogame for who likes to tinkering.

https://twitter.com/maxacaligames

https://www.facebook.com/marbleXeducation/
